entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oromocto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
